content: The Turtle Tear is one of the Epic Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is strong, useful for almost any build.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Turtle_Tear.md', within the main section titled 'Turtle Tear'.
The content is as follows:
The Turtle Tear is one of the Epic Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is strong, useful for almost any build.
